dcterms:creator: Hasam Khalid
Shahroz Tariq
Simon S. Woo
dcterms:description: The FakeAVCeleb dataset is a collection of videos with audio and video manipulations of celebrities that have been generated using various deepfake techniques. The dataset is well-balanced and annotated in terms of gender, race, geography, and visual and audio manipulations, making it useful for training deep learning models that can generalize well on unseen test sets.
dcterms:title: FakeAVCeleb

dcterms:creator: Patrick Kwon
Jaeseong You
Gyuhyeon Nam
Sungwoo Park
Gyeongsu Chae
dcterms:description: The KoDF dataset is a collection of synthetic and real videos of Korean celebrities that have been generated using various deepfake generation techniques. This dataset includes real and fake video and only real audio, and it is used for cross-dataset evaluation for visual and multimodal deepfake detectors.
dcterms:title: KoDF
